sentences.sContent: The distrait actress fluffed her lines.
sentences.sCn: 那位心不在焉的女演员忘了台词。

sentences.sContent: My friend seems upset and distrait; it turns out his dad is seriously sick.
sentences.sContent_eng: My friend seems upset and distrait; it turns out his dad is seriously sick.
sentences.sCn: 我朋友看起来心不在焉的， 原来是因为他爸病重。

synos.tran: （法）心不在焉的（因烦恼、忧惧等）
